pages.text: $(li)The Igloo is a small house that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_tundra)Snowy Tundras$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You should check their interior carefully, not all Igloos are the same, sometimes they hide something inside.$(br)$(li)There are two more variants of the Igloos of stone or grass, which can be found over the Overworld.
